document.masterDocTitle: Five new species of Zercon C. L. Koch, 1836 (Acari: Zerconidae) from northwestern Turkey

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Five new species of Zercon C. L. Koch, 1836 (Acari: Zerconidae) from northwestern Turkey

subSubSection.paragraph:
Materials examined.
287 females
,
95 males
, 48 deutonymphs and 12 protonymphs, soil and litter samples under cypress trees (
Cupressus
sp.), Turkish pine (
Pinus brutia
), mastic trees (
Pistacia
sp.), oak trees (
Quercus
sp.), olive (
Olea europaea
) and moss samples on soil layer, various localities in Eceabat district (Çanakkale province), between
January 2013
and
March 2014
;
527 females
,
193 males
, 144 deutonymphs and 54 protonymphs, soil and litter samples under pine trees (
Pinus
sp.), Turkish pine (
Pinus brutia
), stone pine (
Pinus pinea
), carob trees (
Ceratonia siliqua
), oak trees (
Quercus
sp.), kermes oak (
Quercus coccifera
), common juniper (
Juniperus communis
), Mediterranean cypress (
Cupressus sempervirens
) and moss samples on soil layer, various localities in Gelibolu district (Çanakkale province), between
January 2013
and
March 2014
;
326 females
,
106 males
, 115 deutonymphs and 48 protonymphs, soil, litter and moss samples under pine trees (
Pinus
sp.), Turkish pine (
Pinus brutia
), oak trees (
Quercus
sp.), juniper trees (
Juniperus
sp.), blackberry (
Rubus
sp.), Lebanon cedar (
Cedrus libani
) and poplar trees (
Populus
sp.), various localities in Centre of Edirne province, between
December 2013
and
March 2014
;
39 females
,
12 males
and 5 deutonymphs, soil and litter samples under oleaster–leafed pear (
Pyrus elaeagrifolia
), oak trees (
Quercus
sp.) and cypress trees (
Cupressus
sp.), various localities in Enez district (Edirne province),
8 June 2013
;
18 females
,
5 males
, 11 deutonymphs and 2 protonymphs, soil and litter samples under pine trees (
Pinus
sp.) and Lebanon cedar (
Cedrus libani
),
41 ° 29 ' N
,
26 ° 41 ' E
, 96 m , vicinity of Azatlı village, Havsa district (Edirne province),
March 2014
;
20 females
,
7 males
and 1 deutonymph, soil and litter samples under cypress trees (
Cupressus
sp.) and Turkish pine (
Pinus brutia
), various localities in İpsala district (Edirne province),
June 2013
;
166 females
,
77 males
, 24 deutonymphs and 9 protonymphs, soil and litter samples under cypress trees (
Cupressus
sp.), pine trees (
Pinus
sp.), Turkish pine (
Pinus brutia
), oak trees (
Quercus
sp.), poplar trees (
Populus
sp.), juniper trees (
Juniperus
sp.) and moss samples on soil layer, various localities in Keşan district (Edirne province), between
June 2013
and
April 2014
;
9 females
,
9 males
, 58 deutonymphs and 9 protonymphs, soil and litter samples under Turkish pine (
Pinus brutia
) and oak trees (
Quercus
sp.), various localities in Lalapaşa district (Edirne province),
December 2013
;
179 females
,
63 males
, 55 deutonymphs and 32 protonymphs, soil and litter samples under oak trees (
Quercus
sp.) and poplar trees (
Populus
sp.), various localities in Meriç district (Edirne province),
December 2013
;
66 females
,
15 males
, 8 deutonymphs and 3 protonymphs, soil and litter samples under oak trees (
Quercus
sp.),
41 ° 44 ' N
,
26 ° 52 ' E
, 184 m , vicinity of centre of district, Süloğlu district (Edirne province),
March 2014
;
238 females
,
96 males
, 39 deutonymphs and 13 protonymphs, soil and litter samples under almond (
Prunus dulcis
), oak trees (
Quercus
sp.), Mouth Thabor’s oak (
Quercus ithaburensis
subs. macrolepis ) and alder trees (
Alnus
sp.), various localities in Uzunköprü district (Edirne province), between
March 2014
and
April 2014
;
7 females
,
5 males
and 3 deutonymphs, soil and litter samples under Hungarian oak (
Quercus frainetto
) and pedunculate oak (
Quercus robur
), various localities in Arnavutköy district (İstanbul province),
May 2013
;
7 females
,
2 males
and 1 deutonymph, soil and litter samples under juniper trees (
Juniperus
sp.),
41 ° 13 ' N
,
28 ° 26 ' E
, 108 m , picnic area of Subaşı village, Çatalca district (İstanbul province),
April 2013
;
7 females
and
3 males
, soil and litter samples under tree heath (
Erica arborea
),
41 ° 10 ' N
,
28 ° 51 ' E
, 134 m , vicinity of Pirinççi village, Eyüp district (İstanbul province),
May 2013
;
31 females
,
10 males
and 2 deutonymphs, soil and litter samples under sessile oak (
Quercus petraea
), Aleppo pine (
Pinus halepensis
), cypress (
Cupressus
sp.) and moss samples on soil layer, various localities in Sarıyer district (İstanbul province), between
March 2013
and
May 2013
;
5 females
and
2 males
, soil and litter samples under oak trees (
Quercus
sp.),
41 ° 14 ' N
,
28 ° 12 ' E
, 224 m , vicinity of Büyüksinekli village, Silivri district (İstanbul province),
November 2012
. 464 females ,
201 males
, 61 deutonymphs and 54 protonymphs, soil and litter samples under oak trees (
Quercus
sp.), Aleppo oak (
Quercus infectoria
), hartwiss oak (
Quercus hartwissiana
), pine trees (
Pinus
sp.), Turkish pine (
Pinus brutia
), beech trees (
Fagus
sp.) and oleaster–leafed pear (
Pyrus elaeagrifolia
), various localities in Centre of Kırklareli province, between
December 2013
and
March 2014
;
37 females
,
12 males
and 1 deutonymph, soil, litter and moss samples under oak trees (
Quercus
sp.),
41 ° 29 ' N
,
27 ° 12 ' E
, 133 m , vicinity of centre of district, Babaeski district (Kırklareli province),
April 2014
;
80 females
,
32 males
, 18 deutonymphs and 1 protonymph, soil, litter and moss samples under oak trees (
Quercus
sp.), various localities in Demirköy district (Kırklareli province),
March 2014
;
31 females
,
20 males
, 20 deutonymphs and 9 protonymphs, soil, litter and moss samples under oak trees (
Quercus
sp.), various localities in Kofçaz district (Kırklareli province),
December 2013
;
15 females
,
12 males
, 3 deutonymphs and 1 protonymph, soil and litter samples under stone pine (
Pinus pinea
), Lebanon cedar (
Cedrus libani
) and prickly juniper (
Juniperus oxycedrus
),
41 ° 20 ' N
,
28 ° 18 ' E
, 47 m , vicinity of Düğüncübaşı village, Lüleburgaz district (Kırklareli province),
March 2014
;
73 females
,
33 males
, 43 deutonymphs and 17 protonymphs, soil and litter samples under oak trees (
Quercus
sp.), various localities in Pehlivanköy district (Kırklareli province),
March 2014
;
124 females
,
43 males
, 23 deutonymphs and 5 deutonymphs, soil, litter and moss samples under willow (
Salix
sp.), blackberry (
Rubus
sp.), medlar (
Mespilus germanica
), oak trees (
Quercus
sp.), Aleppo oak (
Quercus infectoria
), Hungarian oak (
Quercus frainetto
), poplar trees (
Populus
sp.) and Turkish pine (
Pinus brutia
), various localities in Vize district (Kırklareli province), between
September 2013
and
March 2014
;
111 females
,
92 males
, 52 deutonymphs and 23 protonymphs, soil, litter and moss samples under oak trees (
Quercus
sp.), Aleppo oak (
Quercus infectoria
), juniper trees (
Juniperus
sp.) and Turkish pine (
Pinus brutia
), various localities in Centre of Tekirdağ province,
March 2014
;
37 females
and
23 males
, soil and litter samples under Hungarian oak (
Quercus frainetto
),
41 ° 22 ' N
,
28 ° 4 ' E
, 214 m , vicinity of Pınarcı village, Çerkezköy district (Tekirdağ province),
September 2014
;
41 females
,
29 males
, 35 deutonymphs and 12 protonymphs, soil and litter samples under blackberry (
Rubus
sp.) and poplar trees (
Populus
sp.), various localities in Çorlu district (Tekirdağ province),
March 2014
;
126 females
,
38 males
, 62 deutonymphs and 36 protonymphs, soil and litter samples under blackberry (
Rubus
sp.), dog-rose (
Rosa canina
) and almond (
Prunus dulcis
), various localities in Hayrabolu district (Tekirdağ province),
March 2014
;
292 females
,
127 males
, 88 deutonymphs and 26 protonymphs, soil, litter and moss samples under pine trees (
Pinus
sp.), Lebanon cedar (
Cedrus libani
), Mediterranean cypress (
Cupressus sempervirens
) and juniper trees (
Juniperus
sp.), various localities in Malkara district (Tekirdağ province),
March 2014
;
14 females
and
2 males
, soil, litter and moss samples under Hungarian oak (
Quercus frainetto
) and downy oak (
Quercus pubescens
), various localities in Saray district (Tekirdağ province),
September 2013
;
491 females
,
189 males
, 153 deutonymphs and 55 protonymphs, soil, litter and moss samples under Turkish pine (
Pinus brutia
), stone pine (
Pinus pinea
), oak trees (
Quercus
sp.), Hungarian oak (
Quercus frainetto
) and juniper trees (
Juniperus
sp.), various localities in Şarköy district (Tekirdağ province), between
September 2013
and
March 2014
.

Remarks. This species was recorded from İstanbul province before, and we report some new localities of this species from Turkey in this paper. This was the most abundant species of
Zercon
in the study area.
